(Statements
  (Class
    (Identifier)
    (Statements

        (Void)
        (AccessibilityModifier)
        (AccessibilityModifier)
        (Empty)
        (Identifier)
        (Annotation
          (Identifier)
          (Array
            (Empty)
            (Identifier)))
        (Statements
          (Statements
            (Assignment
              (Variable
                (Int)
                (Identifier))
              (Integer)))
          (While
            (LessThan
              (Identifier)
              (Integer))
            (Statements
              (Call
                (MemberAccess
                  (MemberAccess
                    (Identifier)))
                (Plus
                  (TextElement)
                  (Identifier))
                (Empty))
              (PostIncrement
                (Identifier)))))))))
